action.name: Set text
action.param: "PRESS "&uppercase(Function.ReturnValue)&" TO CONTINUE TO THE NEXT SUPER LEVEL!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "PRESS "&uppercase(Function.ReturnValue)&" TO HEAD BACK TO TITLE SCREEN."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "PRESS "&uppercase(Function.ReturnValue)&" TO CONTINUE TO THE NEXT SUPER LEVEL!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "PRESS "&uppercase(Function.ReturnValue)&" TO HEAD BACK TO TITLE SCREEN."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "(You can press "&Function.ReturnValue&" to skip any cutscene)"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Even though it's under a huge war."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Robotnik! What da heck are you up to you crazed, manical insane person?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "I will take over this planet stealing all the rings on Mobius and using them in my super devastor!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "I hate to spoil your party, but you ain't gonna have a chance!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "HAHAHAHA! I'll have a surefire victory if you think like that!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Yeah right!!!! Just wait 'til I catch you!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hey, thanx for savin' my life, back there. I almost drowned... just who are you?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hi Sonic, lucky for you, I was passing by. I think you need some help..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Yeah, I suppose you know that Ro-butt-nik is trying to take over the planet by stealing all the rings..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Yes. There is the Ice Palace. You'll have to work your way through that."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "I'll meet you when you get outta there!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hey Knux, where we meant to go now?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "The volcano. Robotnik is planning to set the thing off!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Well, you go sort out the volcano, Robotnik has invaded the Floating Island..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "He's one dead man when I find him!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Over the past two months has been peaceful."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Until the Black Asteroid was heading for Mobius..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Let us actually see WHY it's heading for Mobius"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "So one person on Mobius can save the world from being destroyed."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "(You can press "&Function.ReturnValue&" to skip any cutscene)"
